title: WTB - T206 Ganzel with tougher back
author: Joe_G.

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Ganzel with tougher back
posts.post_content:
Greetings, I'm interested in obtaining a tougher back T206 of John Ganzel, brother of 19th century catcher Charlie Ganzel (a member of the Detroit Wolverines).  I would be happy with any of the following backs:

Drum (assuming it exists)
Broad Leaf
Carolina Brights
<del>American Beauty</del> - purchased July 2011
<del>Cycle</del> - purchased July 2011
Tolstoi

Card does not need to be graded but should be capable of receiving a number grade in the range of 2-6 with good eye appeal.

Thank You,

Thank you for the replys, I've been able to land an AB and may also have a Cycle (TBD).  These are nice cards and satisfy my needs although will keep eyes open for the more difficult backs (Drum, BL, & CB).

Thank You!!
